name: Mathematics
preview: Math class is all about problem solving.

readmore.p: Though we learn enough math to bridge the gap between Algebra II and calculus, the class mainly focuses on the students finding and presenting solutions to problems in many fields of math.

name: Humanities
preview: Humanities is History and English class combined into a big discussion thing.

readmore.p: Every week we write a journal discussing the past week, a grammar error in the wild, and 20 new vocab words we've learned.

name: Physics
preview: Physics class is a combination of note taking and doing problem sets.

readmore.p: Physics class is a combination of note taking and doing problem sets. It's considered advanced physics, but does not exactly follow any AP curriculum.

name: STEM
preview: STEM is a class focused on the two biggest projects of the year, STEM I and STEM II.

readmore.p: STEM I kicks off the school year, and culminates at Science Fair in February. Select Mass Academy students move on to the regional fair where they compete for spots in the international and state level fairs.

name: Scientific and Technical Writing
preview: Scientific and Technical Writing, abbreviated STW and affectionately called "STW," is a chill class.

readmore.p: STW consists of learning grammar, examining science writing, and competing in contests.

French must be spoken at all times in class. Sometimes, we play monopoly and watch movies. We learn new vocabulary by defining and recording any new words we encounter daily, and we record ourselves reading passages to improve our pronunciation.

name: Computer Science
preview: This is a website for CS at Mass Academy.

readmore.p: Copmuter Science teaches the basics of programming using Java, and ends with the Apps for Good project D term.
